breadcrumbAttrs.name: separator
breadcrumbAttrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is >

breadcrumbAttrs.name: options
breadcrumbAttrs.desc: Configure options. The tiny-breadcrumb component can be used independently.

breadcrumbAttrs.name: text-field
breadcrumbAttrs.desc: Specify the breadcrumb display field. This field is used together with options. The component defaults to label.

breadcrumbEvents.name: select
breadcrumbEvents.desc: This event is triggered when breadcrumb-item is clicked.

breadcrumbItemAttrs.name: to
breadcrumbItemAttrs.desc: Route redirection object, which is the same as to of vue-router

breadcrumbItemAttrs.name: replace
breadcrumbItemAttrs.desc: When to is used for route redirection, if replace is enabled, no new record is added to history.
breadcrumbItemAttrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

breadcrumbItemEvents.name: select
breadcrumbItemEvents.desc: This event is triggered when breadcrumb-item is clicked.
